column1: Little Goat Diner////I ordered This Little Piggy Went To China
column2: the sunny side eggs were good but the pork sausage was a little on the salty side. I recommend adding hot sauce to dampen the saltiness. My boyfriend had Okonomiyaki
column3: he said it was really good! I tried it and I agree
column4: it was good! I would recommend that dish. Both of our food portions were good
column5: it wasn't too big and it was just nice for us.
